## 前提条件

```{r eval=FALSE}
pkgs <- c("psych", "modeest", "moments", "DescTools", "vcd",
          "epiDisplay", "correlation", "ggcorrplot","nortest",
          "HH","coin","ggfortify", "rms","broom.mixed","glmnet", 
          "poissonreg","gee", "geepack","survminer","ggsurvfit",
          "pROC","randomizeR","blockrand"
          )

for (pkg in pkgs) {
    if (!require(pkg, character.only = TRUE)) {
        install.packages(pkg)
    }
}
```
